title: There are at least 10 million modern Google Pixel phones in use, ‘Security Hub’ app suggests
content:
The Security Hub was first introduced on the Pixel 6 and later rolled out to other Google phones. In recent days, Security Hub hit 10 million installs on the Play Store — a possible indication of how many modern Pixel phones are in use.

more…

The post There are at least 10 million modern Google Pixel phones in use, ‘Security Hub’ app suggests appeared first on 9to5Google.
